Kerry Katona has unveiled her dramatic weight loss is a result of using hunger curbing injections.

The TV personality, 39, has shared with her social media followers how she managed to loose a stone in four weeks by injecting herself with controversial SkinnyJabs.

In order to demonstrate her transformation, Kerry uploaded a side by side comparison snap of her weight loss onto Instagram on Thursday.

Kerry's pre-weight loss picture showed the star stood in a pink bikini as she peered down at her stomach and pulled at her middle.

In her post weight loss snap Kerry modelled a black two-piece bra and briefs as she flaunted her stomach and peachy bottom.

(Image: Instagram)

The mother-of-four added a lengthy caption to the image where she explained her regime before plugging the jabs the her followers.

She penned: "Soooooo I would like to reveal my amazing secret with you all, I have been doing SkinnyJab for 4 weeks now & I have lost over a stone doing the weekly programme! I feel amazing, fit & healthy."

She continued: "The dietary programme & aftercare is fantastic and super easy, I’m truly thrilled with Caroline & her amazing team."

Some of the Kerry's eagle-eyed fans blasted her for using an old photo, for the one stone heavier snap, which they believe they had seen before and that it was not four weeks prior.

One typed: "That before is a really old photo though."

(Image: Adam Gerrard/Daily Mirror)

(Image: Brett D. Cove / SplashNews.com)

Another added: "Apart from the before picture is not 4 weeks ago."

Sharing that they thought it was sneaky, another follower jibbed: "You DID NOT look like the 1st pic 4 weeks ago! Do you actually think we are all.that thick to believe you went from the 1st pic to the 2nd pic in 4 weeks ?? Wise up Kerry!"

(Image: S Meddle/ITV/REX/Shutterstock)

The cost of SkinnyJab begins with an initial three-week plan costing £250 and top-up treatments are priced at £135 each.

According to the SkinnyJab website - who Kerry has shared provide her with the pricey regime - the injection works by "removing hunger from the equation", while regulating blood sugar levels and helping the body to turn fat into energy.

Recently, Gemma Collins has also credited her weight loss to SkinnyJab injections.
description: The former Atomic Kitten star has credited the weight loss injections for transforming her body
